name: Mega Man Sunrise
storyline: Dr Light built a new highly intelligent robot by the name of "Trance" however after being discarded, she was taken by Dr Wily who reprogrammed her for evil. Alongside 4 other robot masters, she started wrecking havoc across the globe. It's up to Mega Man to once again put a stop to Dr Wily's evil schemes and bring back Trance to reason.
summary: A Gameboy Mega Man inspired fangame. After Dr. Light created a new highly intelligent robot by the name of "Trance", Dr. Wily manages to kidnap her and reprogram her for his evil purposes. It's up to Mega Man to once again put a stop to Dr Wily's evil scheme and bring back Trance to reason.
